page.home.title: Welcome to my portfolio
hero.greeting: Hello, I'm a student in Cybersecurity & Development
hero.description: I build security-focused projects and web applications. Here you'll find my background, skills and concrete projects — including hobbies turned into practical projects.
intro.text: My name is %name%, I develop security-oriented tools, enjoy digital investigation (OSINT/CTF) and solving concrete network problems.
reasons.title: Why I chose this path
reasons.description: I'm very curious; I've been tinkering with computers since I was young which naturally led me here.
projects.title: My Projects & Learning Situations

sae.sae101.title: SAE1.01: Computer Hygiene & Cybersecurity
sae.sae101.desc: ANSSI MOOC, a slide deck about vulnerabilities, oral presentation. Raising awareness of cybersecurity risks and stakes.
sae.sae12.title: SAE12: Intro to Computer Networks
sae.sae12.desc: Discovering networking basics, IP configuration, hardware handling and essential protocols.

page.realisations.title: All my projects
realisations.intro: Find here all my projects and SAEs, with more details, examples and context for each experience.
sae.sae101.long: Context, deliverables, tools and skills related to the ANSSI MOOC and associated work.
sae.sae12.long: Introductory work on network configuration, hardware and essential protocols.
sae.portfolio.long: Development of a complete website to showcase background, skills and projects.
sae.sae103.long: Network infrastructure analysis and on-site wifi coverage measurement missions.
sae.sae103.title: SAE 1.03: Wifi Coverage
project.ctf.long: AC11.06 - Installation, configuration and securing of virtualized client machines.
project.ctf.li1: Virtualization: Deployment of isolated environments under Oracle VM VirtualBox (x86 Architecture, VDI and RAM management).
project.ctf.li2: Bash Administration: Command-line mastery of Linux (Ubuntu 24.04.3): permissions management (chmod/chown), file system and automation.
project.ctf.li3: Network Connectivity: Interface configuration (NAT/Bridge), communication diagnostics (Ping, Traceroute) and DHCP/DNS services.
project.ctf.title: DEPLOYMENT & LINUX SYSTEMS
project.bot.long: AC13.06 - Team organization and synergy within a professional environment.
project.bot.li1: Agile Planning: Design of Gantt diagrams (MS Project) with critical task and margin management.
project.bot.li2: Collaborative Tools: Administration of shared workspaces (Google Drive, Canva) and code versioning via GitHub.
project.bot.li3: Technical Communication: Writing clear documentation and leading follow-up meetings to optimize workflow.
project.bot.title: COLLABORATIVE WORK & PROJECT MANAGEMENT
project.repair.long: Micro-repairs and hardware diagnostics on smartphones, producing guides and documentation.
project.repair.title: Phone Repair
project.web.long: Delivering a website for a client, including design, development and production deployment.
project.web.title: Paid Showcase Website Project
